short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send the HTML source code of the current page to your e-reader

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension extracts the content from the page you are reading and sends it to your e-reader.

This extension keeps only the relevant content such as text, images and formatting (bold, italic, ...). It remove all ads and cookie banners from the page.

If you have a paid news account, it will retrieve its content. What you see on the page, is what you will get in the ebook.

INSTRUCTIONS

- Create an account at https://papeer.tech
- Pair your ereader (Kindle / reMarkable)
- Go to the settings page on https://papeer.tech/settings/apps and copy your API KEY
- Paste the API KEY in the settings of the Google Chrome extension
